titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring His Maiesties further pleasure for matter of buildings
Proclamations. 1619-03-12
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Newmarket, the twelfth day of March, in the sixteenth yeere of our raigne ..
The year date is given according to Lady Day dating.
This state has the arms without a rose and thistle at the top (arms 15).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
